Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ObjectOfChance
    This class implements any object of chance with a discrete set of possible integers starting with 1 to value of your choice (die, coin, dreidel, whatever).
    ScoreCard
    This class implements a Yahtzee score card.
    ScoreLine
    This class is the backbone of the ScoreCard class.
    YahtzeeDie
    This class extends ObjectOfChance to apply specifically to Yahtzee dice.
    YahtzeeGame  
    YahtzeeHand
    This class is a Yahtzee player, whose member fields are the player's hand (an ArrayList of YahtzeeDie), the player's scorecard (a series of ScoreLines as well as tallying fields), and a temporary scorecard the displays possible scoring to the user at the end of each turn.
    YahtzeePlayer
    This class is a Yahtzee player, whose member fields are the player's hand (an ArrayList of YahtzeeDie), the player's scorecard (a series of ScoreLines as well as tallying fields), and a temporary scorecard the displays possible scoring to the user at the end of each turn.
